The girl finds comfort in the company of a visiting American girl and more so in the stories of Celia, a crazy old local who weaves enchanting tales which cleverly combine her own experiences on the island with mystifying legends.","poster_path":"/2zOT6T6Gqm3IcTLkblw06cABCu6.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18,9648,10749],"popularity":5.016,"release_date":"2000-09-11","video":false,"vote_average":6.347,"vote_count":30},{"backdrop_path":"/17V8xfI13uwhPePDoN2dzxzX9VF.jpg","id":13338,"title":"Sione's Wedding","original_title":"Sione's Wedding","overview":"Meet best friends Michael, Albert, Stanley and Sefa; the ladies' man, the good boy, the weird one and the party boy. They're staring down the barrel of their thirtieth birthdays, but still act as if they're sixteen; they get drunk, they chase the wrong women and they have a remarkable record of misbehaving and causing chaos at every wedding they attend. But now Michael's younger brother Sione is getting married, and everything is about to change. Sione is their boy, the kid they used to look after, who grew up while they were still partying. And to ensure his big day isn't spoiled by his boys and their idiot antics, Sione has issued an ultimatum; the guys all have to bring dates to the wedding. And not just any dates; real girlfriends, someone they've made a commitment to. They have one month. So just how hard can it be to get a date for your best boy's wedding?","poster_path":"/q3q4f4rmCRK55fYvQIepYqwjBze.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[35,10749],"popularity":4.675,"release_date":"2006-03-29","video":false,"vote_average":6.1,"vote_count":21},{"backdrop_path":"/6DfhkxnhrE0ztvgEQCVSJ9GN5HA.jpg","id":401687,"title":"Hopeless Romantic","original_title":"Hopeless Romantic","overview":"A man uses methods from romantic comedy movies to try and win back his ex-girlfriend.","poster_path":"/wFBHtEIpBRetjjTDpUizJPa9bpp.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[10770,10749],"popularity":4.965,"release_date":"2016-06-04","video":false,"vote_average":5.4,"vote_count":30},{"backdrop_path":"/xqxlCt4taV1gqCISRoVCRI3Af08.jpg","id":188652,"title":"The Ghastly Love of Johnny X","original_title":"The Ghastly Love of Johnny X","overview":"A truly mad concoction, blending 1950s juvenile delinquents, sci-fi melodrama, song-and-dance, and a touch of horror, everything in just the right combination to create an engaging big screen spectacle! This curious and curiously entertaining story involves one Jonathan Xavier and his devoted misfit gang who, incidentally, have been exiled to Earth from the far reaches of outer space. Johnny's former girlfriend Bliss has left him and stolen his Resurrection Suit, a cosmic, mind-bending uniform that gives the owner power over others. Along the way, there will be several highly stylized musical numbers, lots of genuinely humorous dialogue, and a wacky plot-twist or two, all beautifully captured on the very last of Kodak's
